Action.body: pipeline script is not yet enable in jenkins production.. You want us to modify the same change in CI scripts..Â https://github.com/hyperledger/ci-management/blob/master/jjb/fabric-sdk-node/shell/include-raw-npm-publish.sh#L42-L45

Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: ~rameshthoomu Yes please. The intention here as well is to ensure that we can still build snapshot releases. There should be another JIRA to ensure no official NPM modules for fabric-network will be released when 1.3 is tagged for the node-sdk
